c_ps_slogan.message: Flexible start page that makes your data available in a single view.

c_about_title_0.message: Practical Startpage in chrome web store

c_about_text_0.message: Here you can like, review and rate the extension.

c_about_title_1.message: Spread the Word with e-mail to a Friend

c_about_text_1.message: Click here to generate a mail to a friend.

c_about_title_2.message: Bugs, Ideas or Contribute on GitHub

c_about_text_2.message: If you have any idea for a widget you would like to develop, the code is on GitHub. Here you can also submit bugs and issues.

c_about_title_3.message: Bugs, Ideas or Questions in Google Groups

c_about_text_3.message: Use Google Groups to ask questions, and submit ideas and bugs.

c_help_text_0.message: You can put the widgest where you watn them through the options menu.

c_help_text_1.message: The columns and content adjusts to give best viewing experience for all screen widths.

c_help_text_2.message: The page consists of three columns, but for smaller screens, the right column merges with the center column to allow the content to be usable.

c_o_moreStorageSettings.message: There are additional settings required from the edit menu of this item to be able to sync all data.

c_auth_title.message: Permission to access $url$ is required, click here to authorize!!!

b_gmail_connection.message: Failed to retreive data, please check the network connection and that you are loged on to Gmail!

w_bookmarkTree_help.message:
A Treeview of all the bookmarks, with full text search.
Note: You select the Quicklinks from here by right clicking the folder you want to get your quicklinks from.
Click edit button to get bookmark editor.

w_chromeApps_help.message:
A list of chrome apps presently installed in the browser.
Note: only apps with a page are listed.

w_closedTabs_help.message:
Recently closed tabs.
Note: Is cleared by chrome each time the browser is closed.

w_quicklinks_help.message:
All links in one folder of bookmark folder easily accessible. You select the folder from the bookmark widget.
Note: You can only select one folder and only the bookmarks directly in that folder are shown.

w_rssFeed_help.message: You decide what feeds you will show, E.g. news

w_rssFeed_auth_text.message: RSS uses google apis to get a consistent data structure from the various feeds and will not function without. Click here to proceed and authorize the widget.

w_rssFeed_largeData.message:
The amount of data is too much for Chrome's sync storage, so a bookmarks folder is used to store the deleted Feed items.
The data will not show in the bookmark editor of Practical Startpage, but will show up in other bookmark tools
